name: humblingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that causes someone to understand that they are not as important or special as they thought: These people are humblingly generous with their lives and time. The human body is a humblingly complex world, made up of trillions of cells.
More examplesFewer examplesThe podcast discusses a humblingly concise and relevant essay by a noted academic.The genetic make-up of mice is humblingly similar to our own.The two women had humblingly given up the chance of having a family in order to study and campaign.
